channel.title: How hard would this be?
channel.description:
I wanna make a server like this....
U can ::master or :: pure and u can pickup items except stuff like bandos, dragon, d claws and the good armor and you'd have to get the good armor from pking the drops would be like real runescape pretty hard to get good stuff..and yeah..
How hard would that be? (Pvp planet would be the exact same as this)
